activities: We analyze and model consumer and business to business data for clients who use our analysis to conduct market entry evaluations.  We do not collect or use human resources data.  The data we collect are not used for direct marketing in any way, nor do these data appear online in any way.  Data we purchase are transmitted to us offline.  Because all of our research is conducted in house, none of the data we collect travels beyond our premises.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
